title: Bug 116609 [Regression] Color orange doesn't work.
description: Bug 116609 [Regression] Color orange doesn't work. Description: The orange color is not being applied correctly. Steps to reproduce: 1. Insert a report item. 2. Set the color or background color to orange.
OB: When previewing the report, the color orange is not being displayed as expected.
EB: I expect that when previewing the report, the color orange should be displayed correctly.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Insert a report item. 2. Set the color or background color to orange. 3. Preview the report and notice that the orange color is not displayed as intended.
